resources.string: &appname; requires some permissions to work properly
Android may stop the media server after some time. To prevent this, turn off battery optimization
This permission allows &appname; to read your device\'s storage for sharing media files
&appname; needs to access your device\'s serial number to create a long-term identity number, helping other devices recognize you
Choose the option to determinate the ID of another device
Scan this qr code on another device. You can also manually enter the ID of this device on another
For some reason, &appname; did not find information about this device. To solve this, restart &appname;. If this is not the first time you have seen this message, then please contact the developer
Secret keys are being created. This may take several minutes. Please wait.
Failed to create secret keys. Please try again. If this is not the first time you have received this message, then please contact the developer

The device you are trying to add is offline. To complete the setup, connect both devices to the same Wi-Fi network and either follow the add procedure on the second device, or delete it and repeat the steps on this device
Repeat the adding procedure on the second device to complete the setup
Both devices have been successfully configured
Failed to communicate the second device. To complete the setup, connect both devices to the same Wi-Fi network, delete the device you just added and repeat the adding procedure
Does the following device identifier match what is on the second device in the QR code section?\n\n%s
Are you sure you want to remove the device?
Here you can choose which albums will be available to other devices
Here you can manage your devices. For example, you can deny access to media for specific device
Here you can find %s albums that you have granted access to
Do not forget to run the &appname; service on the second device. Otherwise, the device will not be displayed here
An internal &appname; error occurred (code %s). Restart the application and try again. If this is not the first time you have seen this message, please contact the developer
Device is offline and cannot be reached
Unable to connect to device. There are two reasons for this. The first is that you did not add this device to %s. The second is that you have denied access for this device
For some reason, the video source is missing. Try reloading the album. If this is not the first time you have seen this message, then contact the developer
For some reason, the image source is missing. Try reloading the album. If this is not the first time you have seen this message, then contact the developer
Format of this video is not supported by &appname; video player
Format of this video is not supported by &appname; video player. Do you want to open it in external player?
Unexpected video player error occurred. Please, try again
This software is developed by &author; as a part of the individual project for Samsung IT School
